name: Thunderclap
description: Each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 Thunder damage. The spell's thunderous sound can be heard up to 100 feet away.
higherLevelsDescription: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

effects.special: Affects creatures within 5 feet of the caster.

engineHook.notes: Requires area of effect targeting centered on the caster and a save-for-damage mechanic.
